item.title: Phonebook
item.description: INTRODUCTION At the time of writing this walkthrough, Phonebook is currently active (Oct 2021) and worth 30 points. FIRST TAKE I started up the challenge and visited the website. It is a small login form. Looks pretty typical. Checking the source code for another look reveals a conspicuous little script: <script> const queryString = window.location.search; if (queryString) { const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(queryString); const message = urlParams.get('message'); if (message) { document.
